api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Dust API key (Bearer token). Found in your Dust workspace developer settings.

workspace_id.title: Workspace ID
workspace_id.description: The Dust workspace ID (wId in the API URL).

space_id.title: Space ID
space_id.description: The Dust space ID where the data source lives.

data_source_id.title: Data Source ID
data_source_id.description: The ID of the Dust data source to write documents into.

base_url.title: Base URL
base_url.description: Dust API base URL. Use https://dust.tt for US or https://eu.dust.tt for Europe.

data_format.title: Data Format
data_format.description: Format to write data: 'documents' stores each record as a document (good for unstructured data), 'tables' stores records as rows in tables (good for structured data).

table_id_prefix.title: Table ID Prefix
table_id_prefix.description: Prefix for table names when using 'tables' format. Table names will be '{prefix}{stream_name}'. Only used when data_format is 'tables'.
